name: T - Sarah Caroline
_source: speak;Caroline; You're the leader that Nina reported to, right?{w} The leader of The Defiants?
speak;Sarah; That's right, I'm her.{w} And I assume you're the Caroline that Nina told me about.
speak;Caroline; That's me.{w} I was hoping go get a word in.{w} Maybe ask a question or two while I'm at it.
speak;Sarah; Trust me, I'd love to chat too,{w} but we should really wait for after we're done here.{w} Then we'll have all the time in the world.
speak;Caroline; Fine, but make sure your strikes go through these bandits and not my safehouse walls.{w} My house, my rules, and any scratches on the floor get carved into their makers.
speak;Sarah; Heh, I'll pass the message.{w} I look forward to talking afterwards.
